official_title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and in the International Finance Corporation.

summary.text: Title I: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Amends the Bretton Woods Agreements Act to authorize the Governor of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development to vote for an increase of 70,000 shares in the authorized capital stock of the Bank and to subscribe on behalf of the United States to 13,005 additional shares if such increase becomes effective and if the amount required has been appropriated. Title II: International Finance Corporation - Amends the International Finance Corporation Act to authorize the Governor of the International Finance Corporation to vote for an increase of 540,000 shares in the authorized capital stock of the Corporation and to subscribe on behalf of the United States to 111,493 additional shares if such increase becomes effective and if the amount required has been appropriated.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and in the International Finance Corporation.
